article_title: The Richard Sherman-Erin Andrews interview reenacted by cute kiddos « The Greenroom
article_text:
The Richard Sherman-Erin Andrews interview reenacted by cute kiddos

posted at 11:24 am on January 24, 2014 by Katie Pavlich

It’s been the talk of the week: Is Richard Sherman a jerk for the way he handled himself after Sunday’s big Seahawks’ win? Or was he justified and simply showing his passion? Whatever your view of the actual interview, the reenacted version is hard to hate. Fox Sports won’t let me embed the video, so you’ll have to click through the image to view.
